conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway with clear wall geometry and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent height and thickness; viewing angle is perfect for visibility; floors and volumes are clearly defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room configuration and wall alignment. Minimal points deducted for generic door/window frame treatments compared to detailed 2D plan specifics.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture accurately reflects the 2D plan layout, scale, and room purpose.

visual_clarity.notes: High structural clarity and professional lighting. Significant deduction for E6 (text contamination) as labels are rendered directly onto the 3D surfaces.

detected_errors.description: Room labels and dimensions are rendered directly onto the 3D floor geometry, detracting from the realism of the model.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that perfectly replicates the 2D layout with professional-grade isometric rendering.
